snippet.title: Fate/Samurai Remnant - DLC Vol. 1  Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW:  https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/fate-sr/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=DLC1teaser&utm_campaign=sitelink&utm_id=Caption

"Your wish shall perish..." A Holy Grail War begins in Edo Japan.
The "Waxing Moon Ritual", a battle to the death between seven Masters and their Servants to pursue their wishes...

Fate/Samurai Remnant is now available on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, and Steam®.
DLC 1 "Record's Fragment: Keian Command Championship" releases in February 2024.

Join the #KTFamily:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KoeiTecmoUS
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmous
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/KTFamily

*Screens are taken from an in-development version.
